resources.string: It\'s an ancient artifact, crafted by first necromancers to collect souls of the fallen. Sensing your necromantic abilities it warded itself with a powerful spell. But since the spell is that of an old times, it\'s primitive structure is fairly easy to break.
You may break the spell. Or you may manipulate the magical formula in a way, which will allow you to consume powers of both spell and artifact itself, turning yourself into a Lich.
The _Lich_ is a necromancer who reached pinnacle of his abilities. Existing between life and death _Lich_ excels in necromancy, but his combat skills are greatly reduced.
Or if you _break the spell_ you\'ll be able to use this artifact as normal.
The Black Skull has been awakened!
The Black Skull has raised the dead monster to serve you!
The Black Skull is dormant, once more...

This armor will allow Necromancer to summon up to 2 Deathlings at a cost of 5 souls each. These undead servants will follow their master and attack his foes. The Deathlings becomes stronger with each hero level.
Only necromancers can use this armor!
This robe will allow Necromancer to summon a Deathling at a cost of 5 souls. The Deathlings is an undead minions that grows stronger alongside their master.

resources.string: Deathling is a soul of a fallen hero, that was unfortunate enough to be summoned by Necromantic powers of fellow adventurer.
You do not have enough souls to cast a \"%1$s\" spell.
Your powers defies death! But you lost all collected souls and possessions.
You became a Lich! Your power grows and your soul capacity has doubled! But you lost %1$d points of strength.
To unlock this character class, slay the Lich with any other class.

\"This spirit seems to be struggling in his curse. It appears that he wants something of me. If I use my necromantic powers, I\'ll be able to persuade him that I already done as he asked. That way I won\'t need to waste my time here. Should I do such a thing?\"
Yes, bend it to your will.
The sad ghost has been dominated!
